result.arabic_text: وَمَن تَابَ وَعَمِلَ صَٰلِحٗا فَإِنَّهُۥ يَتُوبُ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ مَتَابٗا
result.translation: 71.Kaadu abe dambik yotoobeeh meqe taama abe num, toysa usuk diggah Yallâ fanah nummâ gacimih gace num kinni, diggah usuk isi Yallal meqe gacimih gacek, tokkel Yalli meqe galtoh kaa gaita.
